prerequisite: Cohort 2011 and before: Completed 80 MCs including 28 MCs in EN, with a minimum CAP of 3.50 or be on the Honours track. Cohort 2012 onwards: Completed 80 MCs including 28 MCs in EN, with a minimum CAP of 3.20 or be on the Honours track.
moduleDescription: This module focuses on the "nouveau roman," a term applied to a sub-genre of twentieth-century fiction, which consciously and self-consciously interrogates, problematizes and plays with traditional conventions and premises of the novel. These include characterization, plot, chronology, narrative authority, author-reader reciprocity and language as agent of meaning and communication.
